5.Pros: People are nice to work with once you become a member of the team as a dedicated employee.. Work is steady and the company pays on time.. A meal discount or free meals depending upon particular store (subject to change).. Its a job in a down economy.
5.Cons: Micromanagement blames anything upon the workers, JIT inventory, supplies always run out or never get ordered, equipment is broken or does not get repaired. Company is very demanding adding more job duties than a sane person can manage, morale is very poor due to a demanding job.. No Benefits (medical insurance, 401K, etc.). Its sad when a subordinate employee has more business knowledge than managers who have been trained by the company.

7.Pros: Great people to work with because it was family oriented.
7.Cons: Working there and making burgers a lot made you smell of onions all the time.
